name: Woody!
iii-course: Front-End Engineer Web Developer Training Course
iii-content:
• Learned the basis of web developing.
  • Started from HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and go on with Node.js, React.js ... etc.
jasso-content:
• Learning Japanese in a big city, Osaka with classmates from around the world.
  • Experienced with Japanese culture and local life.
  • Got contact with local people, refined Japanese skill, got JLPT N1.
  • Got a part-time job at an hobby shop in Nipponbashi working with Japanese.
ncku-major: Department of Systems and Naval Mechatronic Engineering
ncku-content:
• Learned FORTRAN and C
  • Used VBA to analyze the ship hull, and made a graph to present it
  • Learned the knowledge about ship building.
soic: Ship and Ocean Industries R&D Center (SOIC)
soic-content:
• Designed the piping system in machinery part.
  • Planned for shafting system.
  • Made 3D modeling of ship.
jungle-content:
• Worked with Japanese staffs.
  • Interpreted for foreign customers.
  • Packed products for online orders.
navy-content: • Operated and supervised the machineries in main engine room.
prj-comment1: Made with CSS Grid, jQuery i18n
prj-comment1-print: To present my profile what I've experienced in the past time. Using jQuery i18n to provide multilingual page.
prj-comment2: Team Project of Front-End Course, made with React.js, Node.js, mySQL
prj-comment2-print: Dive in the cycling world! A site with cycling news, bicycle products and more!
prj-comment3: Get information of rental bike in Taipei city. Made with OpenLayer API, YouBike API, Bootstrap.
prj-comment3-print: Get status of available bikes at each station with keyword search feature.
